CNN Oztel¶

sota_implementations.oztel_2017.cnn_oztel.create_oztel_model(num_classes=2, input_shape=None, None, 1, optimizer='adam', loss='categorical_crossentropy')[source]¶

Create the CNN proposed by Oztel et. al.

Parameters

  • num_classes (int, optional) – Number of classes to predict.

  • input_shape (3D tuple, optional) – Dimensions of the input image.

  • optimizer (str, optional) – Optimizer used to minimize the loss function.

  • loss (str, optional) – Loss function to use according to Keras options.

Returns

model – Model containing the CNN created.

Return type

Keras model

Here is a picture of the network extracted from the original paper:

sota_implementations.oztel_2017.cnn_oztel.create_oztel_model_V1(num_classes=2, input_shape=None, None, 1, optimizer='adam', loss='categorical_crossentropy')[source]¶

Create the CNN proposed by Oztel et. al.

Parameters

  • num_classes (int, optional) – Number of classes to predict.

  • input_shape (3D tuple, optional) – Dimensions of the input image.

  • optimizer (str, optional) – Optimizer used to minimize the loss function.

  • loss (str, optional) – Loss function to use according to Keras options.

Returns

model – Model containing the CNN created.

Return type

Keras model
